name: Dungeon School
description:
You have been expelled from school and sent to a distant boarding school.

Unknown to your parents, this school is run by a crazy centaur who likes to toughen up his students by sending them into his dungeons.

Can you learn courage and courtesy? Are you brave enough to face orcs, goblins and worse?

Build up your team, collect items, rescue prisoners and fight hideous beasts in this light-hearted strategy game for all ages.

Dungeon School. A game for people who enjoy thinking and reading.
